description: Provide real-time feedback about Checkstyle violations and quick fix actions
configuration.java.checkstyle.configurat: Specify the path of the Checkstyle configuration file
configuration.java.checkstyle.modules.de: Specify the third-party modules used for Checkstyle
configuration.java.checkstyle.properties: Specify the customized properties used in the Checkstyle configuration
Specify if the extension will check the format automatically or not
